Note: Book publisher poster. Date based on publisher's book date. "Visa No. 3090" appears on the bottom right. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French is the advertisement for the book of espionage called  "Le Mystère de Ker-Even" by M. Delly. It was published by L'Écho de Paris. Illustration shows the characters in the book. A large dog appears in the middle of the poster.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: L'Écho de Paris
